I've been buying Carhartt products for 20 years. Basically because they are the best in the business, every business. I'm 7 ft tall. I have attempted to contact Carhartt's corporate office on numerous occasions to have them send me double front unhemmed. They have refused every time. Honestly it sucks. But over the years I have found that if I buy the 36L WASHED, that overtime they won't shrink as much as the firm ones. That being said it's great that I've learned how to wash and dry these badass pants over the years to maintain just the right amount of length for my preference. Every pair of double knee Carhartt pants that I have ever owned have lasted and outlasted every other pair of pants. I just started a new concrete job after 25 years of logging. I tried to put on my double fronts from last year and realized that I gained weight so I had to buy something bigger. Those pants are 12 years old. These pants, well, we'll see. I'm not worried about it. You could say blah blah blah China all you want. We'll see. And I'll update. But the power of manifestation is strong with this one.

These pants are very durable.  I work in construction & you need a pair of pants that withstand the daily grind of construction work.  I also like.the way the pants fit. The only thing that i have against these pants are that the waist size is a little tight so i suggest to size up an inch for the waist.

I've had these pants for about two years now, and as an electrician working in a school, I do a lot of crawling in crawlspaces and climbing into attics. These pants are incredibly durable. I recently noticed a bit of fading in the color after a few washes, especially around the knees, but they still feel great. I really like the double-knee design with rivets, and the Carhartt kneepads I added fit perfectly and are super comfortable. One thing I wish these pants had is deeper pockets, as my phone sometimes falls out when I'm crawling. Overall, they last really well, with just a little fading on the knees.

评论概述: Great pants, a pair last me about 4-6 months.
评论详情: These are my spring and summer daily work pants. In my line of work, there is no point in wearing a clean set of pants daily because it's guaranteed they will be dirty by the end of the day. So, I rotate two pairs, wearing each for three days, then wash them on Sunday. Two pairs will get me through the spring and summer seasons. Then, I switch to insulated waders during the fall and winter. After a season, usually one of the pairs is still wearable, and I save those for backups or other jobs around the house. I'm on my knees a lot, and the double layers come in clutch, increasing the longevity twofold. Personally, I love wearing waders, but it's just too hot during the warmer months, and these pants are the closest thing to the protection waders give me. In conclusion, I highly recommend these pants and also suggest rotating a few pairs. Wearing the same pair every day, like I used to, will result in them getting destroyed, no matter the quality.
Diesel mechanic by trade and they hold up well and last longer than most pants and they shipped faster than expected too

This is a quality product. Very well built. Desirable on every level except fit. How can a pair of pants be the correct waist size and be so huge as not to fit anywhere else. The fit is ridiculous. I would like to return the dungarees bu T there was no return instructions included in the package. Give me a break! These will have to sell in a garage sale at Pennies on the Dollar!
They keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter, I have some that have lasted decades. If you work outside or in these are a blessing to be sure, except no substitute.
Comfortable and hold up well.

评论概述: Overall good pants with an unfortunate zipper issue
评论详情: I work in construction which definitely takes its toll on things like boots and pants, and these are by far the most durable pants I’ve owned. They’re made of a pretty thick and durable material, the most common issue I’ve had with other work pants is over time I get huge holes over my knees from kneeling on rough surfaces like OSB,cement and gravel, so far that issue has been solved by these pants having and additional layer of material firmly attached on the front of the pants starting from just below the hip and running down well below the knee. However as great as these pants are they have an achilles heel… the zipper. my last two or so pairs of these pants have been retired after about 6 months due to the zipper breaking and leaving the fly permanently open which as I’m sure you can imagine leaves you open to a lot of unpleasant remarks on a construction site (as well as an unwelcome cold draft)
I really like the durability and functionality of these pants.
Way too oversized other reviews weren't lying. I measured with a tape measure and the 36x32 I got was a 38x34

I am 6' 8" and wear a 44x36 - and that's what i ordered - - pants were way too long - dropped them off at the seamstress shop and had them take 2" off - still entirely too long and I guess that's my fault since I didn't stay and let the seamstress measure the length - should have returned them once I initially tried them on

These are perfect. Definitely a not Relaxed fit, but I love the fit. Sizing was as expected. Just heavy enough fabric for work without being hot like a double knee denim jean.

All my work pants are Carhartt. Whenever I try to buy them from Amazon, they always fit differently than the ones I try in local stores. Sometimes they fit smaller than they should, or are longer than they should be. These were no different. I bought a 30" inseam and they were 33" long. I've called Carhartt to inform them that I have had this experience many times with Amazon, and asked if the stuff they sell on Amazon is irregular, and they said No. They said there can be a 2-4 % variance, which I think is acceptable, but 10% is ridiculous. Carhartt quality control. Is virtually non-existent for what they sell on Amazon. I feel bad for Amazon because I always find myself returning Carhartt pants. I won't try to buy these on Amazon anymore.
Not happy with the shipping. The pants were shipped in the thin clear plastic they come in from the factory, very odd! I prefer to have some security in the purchases I make.
